abstract: Murder trial of Pfc Joseph Scott Pemberton, accused of killing Filipino Jennifer Laude, begins in Olongapo city, Philippines; marine from New Bedford, Mass, is charged with strangling and drowning Laude after meeting her in a red-light district bar, taking her to a hotel, and discovering she was a transgender woman.
lead_paragraph: An American Marine charged with murdering a transgender Filipino after they checked into a hotel went on trial on Monday in Olongapo city, northwest of Manila.

headline.main: Philippines: Murder Trial for American Marine Begins
headline.print_headline: Asia; Philippines: Murder Trial for American Marine Begins

snippet: An American Marine charged with murdering a transgender Filipino after they checked into a hotel went on trial on Monday in Olongapo city, northwest of Manila.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
